original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)🔽21.7. Sāsavaduka, Kusalattika🔽Naanāsavaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anāsavo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi  sāsavaduka kusalattika  na anāsavam na kusalam dhammam paccayā anāsavaḥ kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: The reverse order of the law of conditionality, the Triad with the words “with root cause”🔽The wholesome with root cause, the unwholesome with root cause, the indeterminate with root cause, the wholesome without root cause, the unwholesome without root cause, the indeterminate without root cause, the wholesome with taints, the unwholesome with taints, the indeterminate with taints, the wholesome without taints, the unwholesome without taints, the indeterminate without taints.

original: Naanāsavaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sāsavo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na anāsavam na kusalam dhammam paccayā sa āsavaḥ kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With the wholesome without taints as condition, the wholesome with taints …

original: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.🔽Naanāsavaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sāsavo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: saṅkhitta hetuyā dve pe avigate dve  na anāsavam na akusalam dhammam paccayā sa āsavaḥ akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
translated: (Abbreviated.) With root cause as condition, two … With direct condition as condition, two … With no condition as condition, two.🔽With the unwholesome without taints as condition, the unwholesome with taints …🔽(Abbreviated.) With root cause as condition, one … With no condition as condition, one.🔽With the indeterminate without root cause as condition, the indeterminate with root cause …

original: Nasāsavaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.🔽Naanāsavaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na sa āsavam na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca sa āsavaḥ abyākataḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā  na anāsavam na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca sa āsavaḥ abyākataḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With the indeterminate without root cause as condition, the indeterminate with root cause …

original: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā dve, adhipatiyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
analyzed: dve adhipatiyā dve pe avigate dve
translated: (Abbreviated.) With root cause as condition, two … With no condition as condition, two.
